title: Which (current) states fought in the American Revolution? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Massachusetts (including Maine), New Hampshire, Rhode Island, Connecticut, New York (including Vermont), New Jersey, Pennsylvania, Delaware, Maryland, Virginia, North Carolina, South Carolina, and Georgia. Vermont split off from New York (and New Hampshire), became a republic, and joined the nation as the 14th state. Maine split from Massachusetts in 1820 as the 23rd state.  Q: Which (current) states fought in the American Revolution?
